Metadata: Currents (Volume 5, Number 1 and Number 2, February and August 1978)
Oregon State University (OSU) Sea Grant Program
Two newsletter issues in one entry for 1978.

The following cover articles are in these issues: Out of the bay and into the hay; Winter waves splitting spit. Other topics include: Aquaculturists meet laws at conference; Tokyo fish doctor at OSU (Dr. Hisatsuggu Wakabayashi); Interest heats up in geothermal aquaculture; University of Idaho studies river shipping; Loran study reports to Coast Guard; Law of the Sea: is there hope? An OSU Sea Grant publications list is also included.
